div.head: 舌乾硬
div.div: the tongue is desiccated and hard

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the tongue is desiccated and hard

sense.def: Illness Sign of a tongue that is dry and cannot be moved freely. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu jing 蕪 菁 quoting Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 : 身體腫強，舌乾燥硬 , “The body is swollen and stiff. The tongue is dry and hard”, writes: 身體強，舌乾硬 , “The body is stiff. The tongue is desiccated and hard ”.
